rule.Sql: select A.ParameterCode ParameterCode,case when b.ParameterValue <> 'NULL' then b.ParameterValue else a.DefaultValue end ParameterValue from tbSystermModel a Left join tbSysParamater b On A.ParameterCode =B.ParameterCode
select CarCode AgvID,CarName,CarState as IsUse,CarIP,CarPort,StandbyLandMark from tbCar where CarState=1;
select *,StorageState as PreStorageState from tbLocaton
select LandCode LandmarkCode,LandName LandMarkName,Landx,Landy from tblandmark

rule.RuleName: 获得所有小车路线关联线段
rule.Sql: select BeginLandMakCode, EndLandMarkCode, Length, ExcuteAngle, ExcuteMoveDirect, ExcuteTurnDirect, SegmentType, ExcuteAvoidance, ExcuteSpeed from tbAllSegment
select Direction,Angle from tbAGVCoordinate
select * from tbChargeInfo

rule.RuleName: 读取交通管制路口档案
rule.Sql: select * from tbTraJunction
select * from tbAGVCurrentRoute where AGVID=$AGVID$
select * from tbIODeviceInfo
UPDATE tbLocaton SET StorageState =$StorageState$ ,LockState = 0 ,LockCar = '',AGVArriveTime='$AGVArriveTime$' where LankMarkCode='$landmarkcode$' And LockCar='$lockcar$'

rule.RuleName: 更新任务明细状态完成
rule.Sql: UPDATE tbDispatchTaskDetail set State=2,FinishTime='$FinishTime$' where dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$' and LandCode='$LandCode$' and DetailID=$TaskDetailID$

select a.dispatchNo, a.stationNo, a.taskType, a.ExeAgvID, a.BuildTime, a.TaskState, a.FinishTime, a.ExeTime, a.CallLand, coalesce(lg.StorageName,'') StorageName from tbDispatchTaskInfo a left join tbLocaton lg on a.CallLand=lg.LankMarkCode where (SUBSTRING(a.BuildTime,1,8) between '$PreDate$' and '$CurrDate$') and a.TaskState in ($TaskState$) order by a.BuildTime asc
select a.*, coalesce(lg.StorageName,'') StorageName from tbDispatchTaskDetail a left join tbLocaton lg on a.LandCode=lg.LankMarkCode where dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$' order by DetailID asc

rule.RuleName: 界面手动更新任务明细
rule.Sql:
UPDATE tbDispatchTaskDetail set State=$State$ where dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$' and DetailID=$TaskDetailID$;
update tbDispatchTaskInfo set TaskState=$State$ where 0=( select count(1) Amount from tbDispatchTaskDetail where dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$' and State!=$State$ ) and dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$'
UPDATE tbLocaton SET StorageState =$storeState$,LockState=$LockState$ where ID=$ID$
select UserID, PassWord, UserName from tbUser where UserID='$UserID$' and PassWord='$PassWord$'

rule.RuleName: 加载用户操作按钮列表
rule.Sql: select a.ButtonType, a.ButtonName from tbUserCategoryToButton a inner join tbUserToCategory b on a.CategoryCode=b.CategoryCode where b.UserID='$UserID$'
select * from tbCallBoxInfo where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$
select * from tbCallBoxDetail where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$

rule.RuleName: 加载任务配置明细必经地标信息
rule.Sql: select TaskConditonCode, TaskConfigDetailID, DetailID, MustPassLandCode, Remark from tbTaskConfigMustPass where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$' and TaskConfigDetailID=$TaskConfigDetailID$ order by DetailID asc

rule.RuleName: 根据IO动作加载对应的IO动作信息
rule.Sql: select * from tbIOActionInfo where ActionID=$IOActionID$

insert into tbDispatchTaskInfo ( dispatchNo, stationNo, BuildTime, TaskState, CallLand, CallID, taskType, GoodsInfo, OwerArea ) values ( '$dispatchNo$', $stationNo$, '$BuildTime$', $TaskState$, '$CallLand$', $CallID$, $taskType$, '$GoodsInfo$', '$OwerArea$' )

insert into tbDispatchTaskDetail ( dispatchNo, DetailID, LandCode, OperType, IsAllowExcute, State, PutType, PassType, IsSensorStop, IsNeedCallBack, IsCallGoods, StorageID ) values ( '$dispatchNo$', $DetailID$, '$LandCode$', $OperType$, $IsAllowExcute$, $State$, $PutType$, $PassType$, $IsSensorStop$, $IsNeedCallBack$, $IsCallGoods$, $StorageID$ )

rule.RuleName: 放行小车处理任务明细
rule.Sql: UPDATE tbDispatchTaskDetail set IsAllowExcute=1 where dispatchNo='$TaskNo$' and LandCode='$LandCode$' and DetailID=( select coalesce(min(DetailID),0) from tbDispatchTaskDetail where IsAllowExcute=0 and dispatchNo='$TaskNo$' and LandCode='$LandCode$' )
UPDATE tbDispatchTaskInfo SET TaskState = $UpdateState$ where dispatchNo='$dispathNo$'

rule.RuleName: 任务完成时更新主任务状态
rule.Sql: UPDATE tbDispatchTaskInfo SET TaskState =$State$,FinishTime ='$FinishTime$' where dispatchNo ='$dispatchNo$'

rule.RuleName: 任务被执行更新任务状态
rule.Sql:
UPDATE tbDispatchTaskInfo SET ExeAgvID ='$ExeAgvID$',TaskState = '$TaskState$',ExeTime='$ExeTime$' where dispatchNo ='$dispatchNo$';
UPDATE tbDispatchTaskDetail set State=$TaskState$ where dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$' and LandCode='$LandCode$' and DetailID=$TaskDetialID$;
select distinct * from tbRouteFragmentConfig
select distinct * from tbCmd

rule.RuleName: 加载调度程序里配置信息
rule.Sql: select distinct * from tbAssemblyConfig

rule.RuleName: 加载触摸屏的生产订单
rule.Sql: select distinct a.*,d.MachineName as MachineTypeStr,b.RGBType from tbProduceBill a left join tbScheduingBill b on a.ProduceBillID=b.ProduceBillID left join tbProduceLineInfo c on c.ProduceID=b.ProduceID left join tbMachineInfo d on a.MachineType=d.MachineID where a.BillState=1 and c.PadID=$PDAID$

rule.RuleName: 加载触摸屏的生产订单
rule.Sql: select distinct a.MachineType,d.MachineName as MachineTypeStr from tbProduceBill a left join tbMachineInfo d on a.MachineType=d.MachineID where a.BillState=1

rule.RuleName: 根据平板ID加载平板操作设置信息
rule.Sql: select distinct b.PdaID, b.BtnID, b.BtnDescript, b.BtnSendValue, a.Area as PadArea, case a.Area when 8 then b.Area else a.Area end Area, a.PadType, a.IsViewArea, b.IsChooseBill, b.OperType, case a.PadType when 0 then -1 else c.StorageState end BtnState from tbPdaInfo a left join tbPdaOperSet b on a.PadID=b.PdaID left join tbLocaton c on coalesce(b.BtnSendValue,'')=cast(c.ID as varchar(50)) where a.PadID=$PadID$ order by Area, b.BtnID asc

rule.RuleName: 根据生产订单号加载生产订单信息
rule.Sql: select a.*,d.MachineName as MachineTypeStr,b.RGBType from tbProduceBill a left join tbScheduingBill b on a.ProduceBillID=b.ProduceBillID left join tbMachineInfo d on a.MachineType=d.MachineID where a.ProduceBillID='$ProduceBillID$' and b.RGBType=$RGBType$

rule.RuleName: 根据生产订单号加载排产信息
rule.Sql: select distinct a.* from tbScheduingBill a left join tbProduceLineInfo b on a.ProduceID=b.ProduceID where a.ProduceBillID='$BillNo$' and b.PadID=$PadID$ and a.RGBType=$RGBType$
UPDATE tbLocaton SET StorageState =$storeState$, MaterielType=$MaterielType$, HandTime='$HandTime$' where LankMarkCode='$LandCode$'

rule.RuleName: 判断当前呼叫点是否可以再次呼叫
rule.Sql: select count(1) Amount from tbDispatchTaskInfo where stationNo=$CallBoxID$ and CallLand='$CallLand$' and TaskState in(0,1)
select UserID, PassWord, UserName from tbUser where UserID='$UserID$' and PassWord='$PassWord$'

rule.RuleName: 加载用户操作按钮列表
rule.Sql: select a.ButtonType, a.ButtonName from tbUserCategoryToButton a inner join tbUserToCategory b on a.CategoryCode=b.CategoryCode where b.UserID='$UserID$'
select * from tbPdaInfo

rule.RuleName: 加载所有平板操作设置信息
rule.Sql: select * from tbPdaOperSet

rule.RuleName: 加载所有平板操作设置信息
rule.Sql: select * from tbCallBoxInfo
select * from tbCallBoxDetail
select * from tbTaskConfigDetail where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$'

rule.RuleName: 判断当前呼叫点是否可以再次呼叫
rule.Sql: select count(1) Amount from tbDispatchTaskInfo where stationNo=$CallBoxID$ and CallLand='$CallLand$' and callid='$CallID$' and TaskState in(0,1)

rule.RuleName: 判断当前呼叫点是否可以再次呼叫
rule.Sql: select COUNT(1) from tbDispatchTaskDetail where dispatchNo in (select dispatchNo from tbDispatchTaskInfo where stationNo=$CallBoxID$ and CallLand='$CallLand$' and callid='$CallID$' ) and IsNeedCallBack in(1,2)

rule.RuleName: 判断当前呼叫点是否可以再次呼叫
rule.Sql: select COUNT(1) from tbDispatchTaskInfo where OwerArea='$callarea$' and TaskState in(0,1)

rule.RuleName: 根据条件加载任务明细
rule.Sql: select * from tbDispatchTaskDetail where dispatchNo='$disPatchNo$' and State in (2) and DetailID=( select max(DetailID) DetailID from tbDispatchTaskDetail where dispatchNo='$disPatchNo$' and State in (2) )

rule.RuleName: 根据任务明细查询相应必经地标的动作档案信息
rule.Sql: select ac.* from tbIOActionInfo ac inner join tbTaskMustPassToIOAction mst on ac.ActionID=mst.ActionID where mst.TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$' and mst.TaskConfigDetailID=$TaskConfigDetailID$ and mst.MustPassLandCode='LandCode'

rule.RuleName: 根据储位状态修改任务状态
rule.Sql: merge into tbDispatchTaskInfo a using ( select dispatchNo from ( select ROW_NUMBER()over(partition by CallLand order by BuildTime ) rowId, dispatchNo from tbDispatchTaskInfo a inner join tbLocaton b on a.CallLand=b.LankMarkCode where b.StorageState=2 and a.TaskState =6 and not exists (select 1 from tbDispatchTaskInfo where CallLand=a.CallLand and TaskState in(0,1)) ) c where rowId=1 ) aa on a.dispatchNo=aa.dispatchNo when matched then update set a.TaskState=0;

select ttd.* from tbDispatchTaskDetail ttd, tbLocaton tl, tbCallBoxDetail tcbd where IsNeedCallBack=2 and ttd.LandCode=tl.LankMarkCode and tcbd.LocationID=tl.ID and tl.ID='$locationid$' and tcbd.CallBoxID='$plccdoe$'

select ttd.*,tdt.GoodsInfo GoodsInfo from tbDispatchTaskDetail ttd, tbDispatchTaskInfo tdt, tbLocaton tl, tbCallBoxDetail tcbd where ttd.dispatchNo=tdt.dispatchNo and IsCallGoods=2 and ttd.LandCode=tl.LankMarkCode and tcbd.LocationID=tl.ID and tl.ID='$locationid$' and tcbd.CallBoxID='$plccdoe$'
update tbDispatchTaskDetail set IsNeedCallBack=3 where dispatchNo='$taskno$'and DetailID='$detailid$'
update tbDispatchTaskDetail set IsCallGoods=3 where dispatchNo='$taskno$'and DetailID='$detailid$'
update tbLocaton set Remark='$remark$' where ID=$ID$
select * from tbAreaInfo
